venue.name: Omni New Haven Hotel at Yale

item.description:
Registration Required: http://ctnext.com/engage/

March 4th 9:00 AM - 1:00 PM (Lunch included)

CT NEXT ENGAGE is a series of interactive dialogues that help us, leaders of the state's innovation community, continue to build our Innovation Ecosystem by engaging with some of the best entrepreneurial thinkers and doers from around the world.

 

We're excited to have Iain Klugman, CEO and President of Communitech, join us on March 4, at the Omni Hotel in New Haven from 9-12. Iain's leadership has been instrumental in developing one of the world's most successful startup ecosystems, in Waterloo, Ontario. Over the last few years alone, Communitech has helped companies raise more than $333m in investments. In 2011 their ecosystem averaged one new company launch per day. All this with a population base of 500,000. Business Week,The Wall Street Journal, The Huffington Post, and the New York Times have all recently covered Iain's work. Read More about Iain.
item.name: CTNEXT Engage: Iain Klugman, CEO and President of Communitech
